Collect 18 points with this purchase Check store stock overlay Please use this overlay to check for product availability [ Product details ](javascript:void(0)) Refresh mind, body and soul, naturally. Our sustainably-sourced pure essential oils harness the power of plants to naturally improve physical and emotional wellbeing. This refreshing Eucalyptus Oil helps to naturally clear the mind and the senses. Eucalyptus Oil blends well with Lavendar Oil. We've taken steps to reduce our impact on the planet at every stage in this product's journey. People tested. - Not Tested on Animals - 100% Vegan - Sustainability Commitment Suitable for Suitable for adults and children 7 years and above How to use For inhalation, vaporisation and bathing, dilute up to 5 drops of oil in water. For massage, blend up to 5 drops of essential oil into 10ml of Botanics Unfragranced Base Massage Oil. Hazards and Cautions For external use only. Never apply neat oils to the skin, always dilute in a carrier oil. Seek professional advice before using if you suffer from epilepsy, skin allergies, are pregnant or, are using homeopathic remedies. Asthmatics should not inhale essential oils. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes rinse well with water immediately. Not to be used on children under 7 years of age. Do not apply to irritated or broken skin. Keep out of reach of children. Storage FLAMMABLE. Store in a cool dry place. Ingredients Eucalyptus globulus oil (naturally contains
